name: Schick Exacta 2 Sensitive Razor (Free 2 pcs)
description:
Blade USA & Body Chaina This Razor makes for a smooth, quick shave. The narrow head helps you get all those hard-to-reach areas like under your nose, a lubricating strip formulated with Vitamin E helps to help reduce nicks and irritation, and a rubber grip handle adds comfort and stability to every stoke. Plus, one push of a button makes for easy rinsing between blades. Ideal for sensitive skin.Close shave even in difficult areas.Easy rinsing with a push clean button.Disposable for more convenience.
Blade USA & Body Chaina
 
This Razor makes for a smooth, quick shave. The narrow head helps you get all those hard-to-reach areas like under your nose, a lubricating strip formulated with Vitamin E helps to help reduce nicks and irritation, and a rubber grip handle adds comfort and stability to every stoke. Plus, one push of a button makes for easy rinsing between blades.
 
Ideal for sensitive skin.
Close shave even in difficult areas.
Easy rinsing with a push clean button.
Disposable for more convenience.

name: Kool Ultra Glide Shaving Foam
description:
Kool Ultra Glide Shaving Foam with its Beard Softner technology will make your beard softer, and its lubricant properties with rich lather will give ultra razor glide for a cool, comfortable and smooth shave. It is specially formulated to give extra care for sensitive skin and to help protect against nicks, cuts, and shaving irritation. Its crisp & musky perfume will stay long even after wash to give you a lasting fresh feel which will certainly help you to Get Noticed!.Ingredients:Aqua, Glycerin, Palmitic acid, Stearic acid, Propane, Butane, Triethanolamine, Laureth-23, BHT, EDTA, Menthol, Perfume.

name: Nivea Men Sensitive After Shave Lotion
description:
Nivea Men Sensitive After Shave - 100 ml. Product type: Shaving & Grooming / Aftershave  Capacity: 100 ml  1.Suitable for Sensitive skin. 2.Used for male. 3.It has 0 percent alchohol which ensures there is no burning on freshly shaved skin. 4.Soothes and calms skin irritation. 5.Enhances skin’s condition over time. 6.Leaves a fresh and caring note.  NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cooling After Shave Lotion. It has 0 percent alcohol and hence there is no burning on application. It soothes skin irritations and improves its condition over time. Additionally, it gives a gentle cooling sensation with a refreshing feel with every use.

name: Kool After Shave Lotion
description:
After the razor does its job, your face cries out for soothing care. Kool After shave lotion gives your skin the best relief from any burning sensations of shaving nicks. Antiseptic protection in Kool After shave lotion prevents any unseen shaving scratches from deadly infections. When you apply the lotion , you'll love the feeling of your skin cooling down by the essence of Menthol. The scent of lavender will call to your spirit within to face another day, another fight..Ingredients: Ethanol, Allantoin, Menthol, Propylene glycol, Perfume, CI 42090, Aqua.

name: Gillette Blue 2 Disposable Razor
description:
Gillette Blue ii disposable razors are an easy-to-use razor that offers a great shaving experience. With a twin-blade head, the blue ii razor is a razor that will give anyone a comfortable shave. The blue ii has a lightweight plastic handle that will make shaving easy. Dimension: Width: 50mm Height: 122mm Depth: 25mm Weight: 10g• Blue II men's disposable razor has lasting blades • The razor features a pivot head that adjusts to the contours of your face for a comfortable shave. • It also has an easy grip handle for great maneuverability.

name: Gillette Blue 3 Disposable Razor
description:
Gillette Blue3 Men's Disposable Razor offers a smoother shave and has better rinsing (vs Blue II). It features an Enhanced Lubrastrip for extraordinary comfort (vs Blue II Plus). A pivoting head adjusts to the contours of your face. Complete with a Soft Ultragrip handle for great control. Get up to 5 shaves per razor. • Smoother shave and better rinsing (versus Blue II) • Disposable razor with enhanced lubrastrip (versus Blue II Plus) • Pivoting head adjusts to the contours of your face  • Soft ultra grip handle for high control.

name: Gillette Guard Cartridges 6 Cartridges
description:
Gillette Guard Cartridge, in a pack of 6 units, is designed to be a single blade system with a safety comb. This helps prevent cuts, nicks and other razor related wounds. This cartridge when used along with the corresponding razor, helps in easy manoeuvring along the curves of the face and the neck in order to provide a precise, smooth and comfortable shave.

name: Gillette Guard Razor Single
description:
A superior grip and flexible pivoting razor head help blades better maneuver the curves of the face, chin, and neck compared to double-edge blades.

name: Gillette Classic Sensitive Pre Shave Foam
description:
Go ahead and get foamy with the rich creamy lather of Gillette Foamy Sensitive Shave Foam. With an extra thick consistency for a shave that's smooth and comfortable. The blade simply glides across your face. Just spread it on shave with ease and rinse clean to reveal skin that  ™s soft to the touch.  Gillette Foamy shaving products feature Gillette Comfort Glide Formula - including Glycerine to hydrate and special lubricants to enhance razor glide for a smooth comfortable shave Spreads easily rinses clean leaving skin feeling soft and smooth Provides gentle shave for sensitive skin.

name: Gillette Classic Lemon Lime Pre Shave Foam
description:
Gillette is a brand to knows exactly what it takes for men to look appealing and stay confident all the time, it brings to you products that are specifically crafted to deliver all you desire - style and comfort. The Lemon Lime Gillette Foam will bring the fresh burst of a hundred lemon trees to your bathroom as you are struggle to lose your sleep every morning. The fragrance adds a refreshed energy to your style as you start your day, so you will be left energized and with skin that feels soft and smooth. name: Gillette Mach3 New Blade Razor
description:
Gillette mach3 men's razor blade refills feature stronger-than-steel blades that stay sharper longer. With sharper blades, it is engineered to last for 15 comfortable shaves. These Gillette razors feature a lubrication strip that glides to help protect your skin from redness and a micro fin skin guard that stretches the skin and prepares hair to be cut. Mach3 men's razor blade refills fit all mach3 razors. Gillette mach3 gives a better shave than a new 2-bladed ordinary razor even after 5 weeks.

name: Denim Original After Shave Lotion
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Experience the timeless appeal of Denim Original After Shave Lotion, a classic grooming essential for the modern man. This 100 ml bottle of after shave lotion embodies the rugged, masculine charm that Denim has been known for, providing the perfect finishing touch to your shaving routine. With its invigorating fragrance and soothing properties, it leaves your skin feeling refreshed, toned, and subtly scented.

name: Denim Black After Shave Lotion
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Denim Black After Shave Lotion 100 ml is a premium grooming essential that adds the perfect finishing touch to your shaving routine. Crafted with care, this after-shave lotion is formulated to soothe and hydrate your skin, helping to alleviate post-shave irritation while leaving a lasting and masculine fragrance. It's the ideal choice for men who want to maintain a fresh and confident appearance while enjoying the benefits of a captivating scent.
